issue.title: [CF 1343] Add BRM Monk's Stagger Bar to 'Resources'
issue.body:
Stagger is now shown as a bar much like a shaman's Maelstrom or a shadow priests Insanity.  It'd be nice to have this as an option under the 'Resources' condition.


> Posted by CurseForge user Raxle | Imported from CurseForge issue #1343 | Raw
